data.text: @Bodyfirst_PT @Tertianship @CarrDutton @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk Yes but if more people come through that are seriously ill with covid what are the hospitals meant to do? Magic up more staff, magic up more doctors, magic up more beds??? Your level of thinking on this, is that of a child’s. This is why you need to grow up.
@stugooner1984 @Tertianship @CarrDutton @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk Not saying they weren't. However they're are other conditions to! Not just covid so get over yourself!

@Bodyfirst_PT @Tertianship @CarrDutton @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk Idiot. Just because the survival rate is 98% doesn’t mean more people weren’t seriously ill and needing hospital treatment! F**k you are so deluded, grow up.

@stugooner1984 @Tertianship @CarrDutton @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk I'd rather have a chance at 98% than 75% that my advance stage cancer is going to give me. My cancer is only advanced because covid was the priority with a 98% survival rate!

@neilstweet @amagee29 @NHSEngland As you are probably aware the only official data source on Covid vaccine injuries is their Yellow Card Scheme. Although I’m sure if injuries are as rare as you say they wouldn’t need to have set up a new govt department to process compensation.
@Tertianship @CarrDutton @Bodyfirst_PT @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk 99.9% survival rate yet the closed cases as of today but it at 98%. You lying little 🔔🔚. https://t.co/HEUGnHA6YJ

@neilstweet @amagee29 @NHSEngland No it doesn’t sound like that at all. I believe it’s a decision for the parents to make. Yes it is rare for majority but it does happen or are you denying that unfortunately some people have had adverse reactions.
@bobduff80 @DazeJohnby @CarrDutton @Bodyfirst_PT @pocketdragon39 @NHSEngland @NHSuk If the average age of death doesn’t mean anything to you, why did you mention it at all???
@CarlLewLV @amagee29 @NHSEngland Sounds like you are almost wishing ill health on vaccinated children.

@CarlLewLV @amagee29 @NHSEngland Can you share the data on these casualties? 
JCVI have supported vaccines for over 12s since Sept and now over 5 year olds. Said marginal risk of covid but overall benefit of vaccines outweighs all risk
